languages.text: Лорд-капитану удалось заманить Немезита в ловушку, но ожившая легенда нижних палуб не сдастся без боя.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану удалось заманить Немезита в ловушку, но ожившая легенда нижних палуб не сдастся без боя.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesis into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesis into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat Nemesit in eine Falle gelockt, aber die aufständische Legende aus den unteren Decks wird nicht kampflos aufgeben.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat Nemesit in eine Falle gelockt, aber die aufständische Legende aus den unteren Decks wird nicht kampflos aufgeben.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha logrado atraer a Nemesitio hasta una trampa, pero la leyenda renacida de las cubiertas inferiores no se rendirá sin presentar batalla.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha logrado atraer a Nemesitio hasta una trampa, pero la leyenda renacida de las cubiertas inferiores no se rendirá sin presentar batalla.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはネメサイトを罠に誘い込むことに成功したが、下位デッキの復活を遂げた伝説の男が戦いもせずに諦めることはないだろう。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはネメサイトを罠に誘い込むことに成功したが、下位デッキの復活を遂げた伝説の男が戦いもせずに諦めることはないだろう。

languages.text: 领主舰长成功地将涅墨斯特诱入了陷阱之中，但底层甲板的传说人物是不会不战而退的。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长成功地将涅墨斯特诱入了陷阱之中，但底层甲板的传说人物是不会不战而退的。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a réussi à attirer Némésite dans un piège, mais la légende résurgente des ponts inférieurs n'a pas dit son dernier mot.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a réussi à attirer Némésite dans un piège, mais la légende résurgente des ponts inférieurs n'a pas dit son dernier mot.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, Nemezit'i tuzağa çekmeyi başardı ancak alt güvertelerin yeniden dirilen efsanesi, kolay pes edecek gibi görünmüyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has managed to lure Nemesite into a trap, but the resurgent legend of the lower decks will not give up without a fight.
